job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the design and development of algorithms, including ML/AI-based solutions for patient monitoring and risk prediction. While generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on predictive modeling for vital signs analysis and biomarkers, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile's concentration on predictive models and data-driven algorithms. The mention of project management is secondary to the core technical development of these algorithms.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions' and 'Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms' directly refers to the creation and implementation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions' indicates the creation and implementation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction' describes the application of predictive modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings' implies the need to integrate algorithms into functional systems.
job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies' indicates involvement in project management and understanding business/project goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions' suggests a need for robust, production-ready systems that meet specific standards, implying operational considerations.
job_tasks.phrase: develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions

soft_skills.phrase: Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader
Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation
works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams
